DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate ongoing safety , tolerability , efficacy parameter PRX-102 adult Fabry patient successfully complete treatment PRX-102 study PB-102-F01 PB-102-F02 . Patients enrol receive dose PRX-102 ( 0.2 mg/kg , 1.0 mg/kg , 2.0 mg/kg ) , intravenous infusion every 2 week 24 Months .
